WorkflowInfo.Name: Send text message to a list of recipients
WorkflowInfo.Description: Read a list of recipients and send them text message

WorkflowInfo.Details: This process retrieves a list of cell phone numbers from an Excel file or a memory table and sends a text message to each address.
